title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in App Development: Analyzing the Impact of E-Learning on the Education Industry: Experiences Utilizing IPA

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ICT (Information and Communication Technology) application skills and general understanding of educational systems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least two core themes from e-learning experiences by applying the IPA (Issues Prioritization Analysis) methodology
Learners can write reports analyzing facilitating/inhibiting factors in e-learning adoption within simulation environments
Learners can propose educational policy improvement plans from an international comparative perspective through VR-based case studies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
